conversation-title: A guy in my psychology class said he thought orientation could possibly be a choice;

conversation.name: Me
conversation.label: Me:
conversation.phrase: Okay so if orientation is a choice, choose to be gay, right now.
Because I don't find men attractive
conversation.label: Him:
conversation.name: Him

conversation.phrase: So CHOOSE to find them attractive
conversation.label: Me:
conversation.name: Me

conversation.phrase: Sorry, WHAT was that? You CAN'T????
conversation.name: Me
conversation.label: Me:

conversation-text:
Me: Okay so if orientation is a choice, choose to be gay, right now.

Him: No.

Me: Why not?

Him: Because I don't find men attractive

Me: So CHOOSE to find them attractive

Him: ....... I can't.

Me: Sorry, WHAT was that? You CAN'T????
